TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompilationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class CompilationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定义用于支持 Web 应用程序的编译基础结构的配置设置。

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the compilation infrastructure of Web applications.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种方法以编程方式访问和修改的内容`compilation`配置文件的部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `compilation` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的多个属性指定值`compilation`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `compilation` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`compilation`部分。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `compilation` section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的成员类。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 你可以获取的实例类使用方法。You can obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

value.span: 一个包含编译 ASP.NET 资源期间所使用的程序集对象的 。

span.span: A that contains the assembly objects used during compilation of an ASP.NET resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含程序集引用编译动态 ASP.NET 资源期间使用。This property contains the assembly references to use during compilation of a dynamic ASP.NET resource. ASP.NET 编译每个代码模块时，会自动将这些程序集链接到该资源。ASP.NET automatically links these assemblies to the resource when compiling each code module.

span.span: A string value specifying the post-process compilation step for an assembly.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否尝试批编译。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether batch compilation is attempted.

value.span: 如果尝试批编译，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if batch compilation is attempted; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`若要更改所需的编译时访问未编译的文件导致的延迟。Set this attribute to `true` to change the delay caused by the required compilation when you access an uncompiled file. 此属性设置为`true`指示 ASP.NET 预编译在批处理模式下的所有未编译的文件。Setting this attribute to `true` instructs ASP.NET to precompile all the uncompiled files in batch mode. 首次编译这些文件; 时出现延迟但是一旦文件进行编译，消除延迟。A delay occurs when the files are first compiled; however once the files are compiled, the delay is eliminated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan BatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.BatchTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置批处理编译的超时期限（以秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示允许批处理编译进行的时间长度（以秒为单位）。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds granted for batch compilation to occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示超时期限，以秒为单位，批处理编译。Indicates the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation. 如果不能在超时期内完成编译，编译器将恢复为当前页的单一编译模式。If the compilation cannot be completed within the time-out period, the compiler reverts to single-compilation mode for the current page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置要在动态编译文件中使用的默认编程语言。

span.span: A value specifying the default programming language to use in dynamic-compilation files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的默认编程语言，如 C# 或 VB.NET，在动态编译文件中使用。Specifies the default programming language, such as C# or VB.NET, to use in dynamic compilation files. 使用定义的语言名称`system.codedom`部分。Language names are defined using the `system.codedom` section. 默认编程语言是`vb`，它指定的默认编程语言为 VB.NET。The default programming language is `vb`, which specifies VB.NET as the default programming language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 应用程序是否可以利用 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 预取功能。

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预提取是一个实用工具，旨在通过应用程序数据加载到内存之前其来提高应用程序启动性能。Prefetch is a utility that is intended to improve application startup performance by loading application data into memory before it is demanded . > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]预提取服务必须配置并运行此设置才能生效。The [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch service must be configured and running for this setting to be effective.

value.span: 如果启用 Visual Basic 编译选项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Visual Basic compile option is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的设置的 Microsoft Visual Basic`explicit`编译选项。This property specifies the setting of the Microsoft Visual Basic `explicit` compile option. 如果设置为`true`，Visual Basic`explicit`编译选项处于启用状态。When set to `true`, the Visual Basic `explicit` compile option is enabled. 启用该选项后，所有变量必须显式都声明使用`Dim`， `Private`， `Public`，或`ReDim`语句。When the option is enabled, all variables must be explicitly declared using a `Dim`, `Private`, `Public`, or `ReDim` statement. 默认值为 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序重新启动前可发生的资源的动态重新编译的次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 一个指示应用程序重新启动前可发生的资源的动态重新编译的次数的值。

span.span: A value indicating the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 默认为 15 次重新编译。

span.span: The default is 15 recompilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示动态重新编译的应用程序重新启动前可发生的资源数。Indicates the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts. 在全局和应用程序的配置级别中，但在目录配置级别不支持此属性。This attribute is supported at the global and application configuration levels, but not at the directory configuration level. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 会增加属性值每次程序集将失效，未能被删除。ASP.NET increases the property value every time an assembly is invalidated and fails to be deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为，ASP.NET 编译系统启用优化，旨在提高 ASP.NET 启动性能，但是会增加 CPU 使用率的速度。When this property is set to , the ASP.NET compilation system enables optimizations that are intended to speed up ASP.NET startup performance at the expense of increased CPU utilization. 此属性的默认设置为 。The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`true`，编译显式禁止任何数据类型转换的数据可能会发生丢失，以及任何数值类型和字符串之间的转换。When `true`, compilation explicitly disallows any data-type conversions in which data loss would occur, and any conversion between numeric types and strings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何面向.NET Framework 的某个特定版本的信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目的.NET Framework 多目标](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76)。For information about how to target a specific version of the .NET Framework, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76). ## Examples [compilation 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性指定为`true`在配置中，Url 将使用为编译器指令而不是物理路径。If this property is specified as `true` in the configuration, URLs will be used for the compiler instructions instead of physical paths. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
